meanings.definition: Courses of study broadcast via television.
meanings.sent1: Many students enjoy watching telecourses to learn new things.
meanings.sent2: I signed up for two telecourses this semester to improve my skills.
meanings.sent3: The telecourses on cooking made me hungry every time I watched them.
meanings.sent4: Telecourses are like having a knowledgeable friend teach you through the TV screen.
meanings.sent5: The telecourses on astronomy made me feel like I was exploring the universe from my living room.

meanings.definition: The act of taking a course of study broadcast via television.
meanings.sent1: Her dedication to telecourses helped her succeed in her career.
meanings.sent2: Telecourses provide a convenient way to learn without leaving home.
meanings.sent3: I always feel like a TV star when I participate in telecourses.
meanings.sent4: Taking telecourses is like having a personal tutor on your screen.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of starting new telecourses is like unwrapping a gift every time.
